item.description:
Approximately a 30 mile scenic ride meanders through East Providence, Seekonk, Barrington. Portions of the ride include the East Bay Bike Path, Barrington Beach, and the RI Country Club. Lunch stop by the water in Bristol so bring a lunch, water, and snacks. Helmets req'd. The start of the ride is the big parking lot of the East Bay Bike Path in East Providence.

From Providence: Route 95 to Route 195 East, take Exit #5 for Warren Avenue, Right on Warren, go under the bridge and take First Left on First Street. At your second stop sign take a Right on Veterans Memorial Parkway. Follow Veterans Memorial Parkway to the top of the hill and you will see a Large Parking Lot on the Right.

From Fall River: take 195 to exit 6 and take a left at the end if the exit ramp onto Broadway. Go under the bridge and straight through the light. Continue on South Broadway (Broadway changes from to South Broadway). At the end of South Broadway, take a right onto Veterans Memorial Parkway. Travel about 1 Â½ mile and the parking lot is on the left.

I drive a gray Kia Sportage with a chrome roof rack. I usually park on the grass.
item.name: Bike Ride Around East Bay
